Package org.zone.region.bounds

Interface Region

All Known Implementing Classes:
BoundedRegion, ChildRegion
public interface Region
The region of the zone The locations that the region covers

  • Method Details

    • contains

      boolean contains​(@NotNull @NotNull org.spongepowered.math.vector.Vector3d location, boolean ignoreY)
      Checks if the position in the world is contained within this region
      Parameters:
      location - The block position to compare
      ignoreY - true will ignore the height in the provided location
      Returns:
      true if the region contains that block position

    • getNearestPosition

      Optional<org.spongepowered.math.vector.Vector3i> getNearestPosition​(@NotNull @NotNull org.spongepowered.math.vector.Vector3i vector3i)
      Gets the location within the region that is nearest to the provided block position
      Parameters:
      vector3i - The block position to compare
      Returns:
      The closes block position, if Optional.empty() then the closes could not be found. This is highly unlikely but is possible

    • save

      void save​(org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationNode node) throws org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.SerializationException
      Serializes the region to the provided node
      Parameters:
      node - The node to serialize this region to
      Throws:
      org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.SerializationException - If the zone could not be serialized

    • getChildren

      Collection<Region> getChildren()
      Gets the children of this region
      Returns:
      The children of this region, the collection should be unmodifiable and can be any type of Collection

    • getTrueChildren

      default Collection<BoundedRegion> getTrueChildren()
      Gets all the BoundedRegion found within this region. This is mainly for ChildRegion
      Returns:
      All the BoundedRegion within this region

    • contains

      default boolean contains​(@NotNull @NotNull org.spongepowered.math.vector.Vector3i vector3i, boolean ignoreY)
      Checks if the provided position is contained within the region
      Parameters:
      vector3i - The block position to compare
      ignoreY - if true, the height will be ignored in the check
      Returns:
      if true, the position is contained

    • contains

      default boolean contains​(@NotNull @NotNull org.spongepowered.api.world.Location<? extends org.spongepowered.api.world.World<?,​?>,​?> location, boolean ignoreY)
      Checks if the provided position is contained within the region. Note that the world is not compared, use Zone.inRegion(Location) for the world to also be compared
      Parameters:
      location - The block position to be compared
      ignoreY - if true, the height will be ignored in the chunk
      Returns:
      if true, the position is contained
